title: Hotham holiday
brief_description: Shows Mount Hotham, Victoria as a holiday getaway - the snow fields, ski-runs; the trip from Harrietville 12 miles away; people riding horses to reach the snowline; beautiful views and natural environment. Hotham Heights is the highest meteorological station in Australia. This film was made pre “chairlifts”.
